definition: The act of gathering or collecting crops, typically referring to the process of harvesting agricultural produce. It commonly denotes the time or season when crops are gathered from the fields.

examples.german: Die Bauern bringen ihre Ernte auf den Markt.
examples.english: The farmers bring their harvest to the market.
The harvest season starts in autumn.

examples.german: Die Ernte wird von vielen Helfern eingebracht.
examples.english: The harvest is brought in by many helpers.

examples.german: Die Ernte ist abh√§ngig vom Wetter.
examples.english: The harvest is dependent on the weather.
